High-level wrapper to correlate all features with multiple covariates.

Source: R/covariate_correlation.R
correlate_matrix_with_covariates.Rd

High-level wrapper to correlate all features with multiple covariates.

Usage

correlate_matrix_with_covariates(
  mat,
  covariates,
  method = c("spearman", "pearson"),
  adjust_method = "BH",
  feature_type = c("gene", "protein", "pathway")
)

Arguments

mat

Numeric matrix (features x samples).

covariates

Data.frame with rownames matching sample IDs (columns numeric or coercible).

method

Correlation method.

adjust_method

P-value adjustment method (BH by default) applied within each covariate.

feature_type

Character label ("gene", "protein", or "pathway") used in output column naming.

Value

Long-format data.frame: feature, variable, cor, pvalue, padj.
